scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p bin && (curl -L https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp/releases/latest/download/yt-dlp_linux -o ./bin/yt-dlp || wget -O ./bin/yt-dlp https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp/releases/latest/download/yt-dlp_linux) && chmod +x ./bin/yt-dlp && node -e "const p=require('ffmpeg-static'); if(p){const fs=require('fs'); fs.mkdirSync('bin',{recursive:true}); try{fs.symlinkSync(p,'bin/ffmpeg')}catch(e){try{fs.copyFileSync(p,'bin/ffmpeg')}catch{}} try{fs.chmodSync(p,0o755)}catch{} try{fs.chmodSync('bin/ffmpeg',0o755)}catch{} }"
